title: I am a second year mechanical engineering student. I am not able to understand workshop technology. How should I learn the subject? Which is the best book for it? - Quora

response.answer_text: work shop technology is practical type of subject. you need better visualization for better understanding. you can watch video on you-tube. because by watching the process of machine you can understand it better. by the way it is the easiest subject for mechanical engineer, it’s like ABCD of mechanical engineering.

See, the best learn and score good in manufacturing technology is to study the diagrams and imagine the basic process involved .The trick is to study the subject practically.
